corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations

body.p:
i received your letter yesterday it is the first i believe that i have got on tuesday Tuesday but i am very thankfullthankful to get them wensday Wednesday i should have written immediately and told you the letter and 2 dollr dollars came safe but i was fixing georgesgeorge's things a little as he has gone to camden Camden to the foundry
he and mrMr. Lane went last night in the 6 oclock o'clock train georgyGeorgey dident didn't want to go much i dont don't think it was on my account but georgyGeorgey is very much carried away by somebody who it is is best known to himself he gets 5 dollar dollars per day and his expences expenses paid to the city once a month if he comes oftener he pays his own way he said he should come 2 weeks from next saturday Saturday i think sometimes its it's a pity such a good man as georgeGeorge would be) he is good to me but he seems to be so close with his moneey money maybee maybe he has uses for it that i little know he pays the rent and when i ask him for ten cts cents he gives it to me but he used to be so different well waltWalt we all change some for better and some for worse

i was so glad to get your letter waltWalt yesterday i have not got any hous house yet mattsMatt's got a letter from jeffJeff monday Monday and a check for 50 dollars and yesterday she got one from Worthen for 200 dollars for Jeffs Jeff's servises services in the board of health and there is one hundred more to come to Jeff georgeGeorge brought the check up for the 200 hundred and said there was another hundred to come i said to georgeGeorge when i give matt this check she will say when will she get the other sure enoughf enough i gave her the 200 doller dollar check and she said she wished they would hurry up and pay the other hundred i said i told georgeGeorge you would want the other and you dident didn't know you was going to have any so waltWalt you see folks changes) but waltWalt i think you and your old mother is about as reliable and good as you can find) mat is waiting to take the letter i have got a very bad cold and am pretty lame but i must bear it

postscript.p: take good care of yourself the next i will write about domestic affairs
